name: Sky Invaders (Elton Alves)
description:
This is a game for people who played Atari's iconic Space Invaders, it has been completely reworked in 2D vector graphics in addition to having a secondary fire option that does more damage and has a total of 5 stages.

Controls

  • A/D - Horizontal Movement
  • Mouse 1/2 - Shoot
  • Esc - Pause Menu
